data.title: once in a lifetime
data.text: attended a chorale there. OMG; beautiful.Sooo beautiful, i think it has been restored from a fire. Forgive me if i am wrong.

data.title: Shoes
data.text: Lovely area for shopping I love DSW. Plus many places to eat Cheesecake Factory one of my favorite thing about TownCenter. You must  take trip if you haven't been able to I would say girls day out you will absolutely enjoy yourself.

data.title: Downtown stone cathedral with great windows
data.text: This imposing stone edifice sits on a rise facing south. Although kept locked weekdays, access can be made through inquiries at the office. Outside, the square tower with stupendous gargoyles draws the eyes to the eagles in the centers. There is a round building and a side chapel in addition to the main sanctuary. In the sanctuary's nave the clean lines and walls enhance your viewing of the turn of the century (~1905) stain glass, with many smaller figures represented. The pipe organ looks awesome, and should recommend attending a choral service, especially as my guide indicated the Canon has full mastery of the instrument.

data.title: Wow what a large church
data.text: Very beautiful church and old such architecture and its huge. It almost takes up an entire block.  If you're downtown Jacksonville certainly take a moment to drive by to take a look

data.title: Beautiful Cathedral
data.text: A truly beautiful building inside and out.  Beautiful stained glass windows, and woodwork inside the chapel.  The church has an organ that fills the space with music perfectly.  They serve a buffet lunch in the fellowship hall each Friday from 11am to 1pm for $10.  They always have live music at the lunch.

data.title: It was breathtaking
data.text: Even though it was for a funeral, I was surprised Jacksonville had such an amazing Church in town.  It is so much like the European churches with a glorious interior with beautiful stained glass windows, carvings and light from all directions making it an ethereal experience.

data.title: Funeral
data.text: This is a beautiful church with an outstanding organist and staff. We were greeted warmly and the service was timely and impressive.

data.title: Church Street
data.text: Beautiful church in downtown Jacksonville! The architecture and designs on all four sides are well worth the time to walk around it. Although I wasn't able to view inside, I anticipate that it, too, would be beautiful.

data.title: fascinating architecture!
data.text: The Gothic style cathedral is very outstanding building of the downtown Jacksonville. The architecture is so untypical in a good way. The gargoyles are especially interesting. I really enjoyed the view!

data.title: Central
data.text: Igreja localizada em downtown de Jacksonville, sendo a mais famosa da cidade. Fomos durante a noite, e, assim como os demais pontos turísticos da cidade, ficam bem iluminados e acabam rendendo ótimas fotos, porém, estava fechada para visitação.

data.title: must see
data.text: destino obligatorio en jacksonville, ideal para familias y apreciar el estilo de iglesias y religión de la zona.

data.title: Schön
data.text: Eine sehr schöne Kirche, die ein bisschen versteckt liegt, sollte man sich aber angucken. Wir haben sie allerdings mit Google Maps sofort gefunden und waren beeindruckt.
